text: Ara tamra nidarsanagulora madhye hacche ye, tumi prthibitake dekhate paccha sukano, tarapara yakhana tara upare amara barsana kari brsti takhana ta cancala haya o phempe othe. Nihsandeha yini etike jibanadana karena tini'i to mrtera pranadata. Tini niscaya'i saba- kichura upare sarbasaktimana.
